name: NostalgicTHINGS
description:
Connect the old with its new version, a puzzle game with 12 levels, a short game that won't take you more than 5 minutes to complete... or will it?

A small videogame created for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #002" with the theme "Nostalgia", created in a couple of days with a retro look (GameBoy style).

A game in which you will have to overcome different levels, and in which you will have to connect with pipes things with their old versions and their current versions.

It includes 2 game modes with 6 levels each, the first one is objects in which we compare old objects with their current version and the second mode is Logos in which we also compare old logos with their current version.

Please write your comments, I hope to receive feedback to know in which aspects to improve, and I hope you like the game since it is my first GameJam.
